tool_description: Creates detailed timeline with milestones, deadlines, and communication schedule for RFP submission process.

response_period_days.description: Number of days for vendor response (7-180)

question_deadline_days.description: Days before submission deadline for questions (1-30)

business_days_only.description: Whether to count business days only

error_messages: Invalid release date: RFP release date must be a valid future date in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid response period: Response period must be between 7 and 180 days.
Invalid question deadline: Question deadline must be between 1 and 30 days before submission.
Invalid evaluation period: Evaluation period must be between 7 and 90 days.
Timeline conflict: Question deadline must be before submission deadline.
usage: Provide rfp_release_date and response_period_days. Optionally configure prebid conference, question deadlines, evaluation period, and business day preferences. The tool generates complete timeline with all key dates.

complete_timeline.description: Comprehensive project timeline with all key dates

key_milestones.description: List of key milestone dates and activities
